telephony_alias_portability_order_infos: Throughout the duration of your contract, portability of your geographic and non-geographic numbers to OVHcloud is totally free.
telephony_alias_portability_order_infos_: Porting is currently restricted to the following countries: France, Belgium and Switzerland.
telephony_alias_portability_order_warnin: To protect you against any service interruption with your ported number, request the termination of your telephone line with your current provider only when the portability process is completed.
However, if you cancel your line with your current operator, you have 40 days to request porting. After this period, you will lose your number.
If you port the number that is linked to your internet connection, your internet access will be cut off.
telephony_alias_portability_order_type: You wish do order porting for:
telephony_alias_portability_order_sda: One or more numbers belonging to a pool of numbers (DID)
telephony_alias_portability_order_sda_wa: Since special numbers cannot be the subject of an isolated number portability request, please choose the portability for a range of numbers (SDA)
telephony_alias_portability_order_callNu: Please enter a number in international format (0044... or +44...).
telephony_alias_portability_order_rio_in: Porting Authorisation Code (PAC): call 3179 to obtain your PAC.
telephony_alias_portability_order_contac: Carefully enter the information stated on the bill from your current operator
This number will only be used for tracking your portability process and will not be used for commercial purposes.
telephony_alias_portability_order_redire: Do you wish to redirect the number to a line?
If you do not select a line, you can complete the redirection later.
telephony_alias_portability_order_sda_al: Port your main number and all of the linked Direct inward dialling (DID) numbers. (In this case, the list of DIDs will be sent to you by email in the next few days.)
telephony_alias_portability_order_sda_se: Port your main number and a part of the Direct inward dialling (DID) numbers.
telephony_alias_portability_order_sda_ad: The following numbers will also be ported:
telephony_alias_portability_order_error: Oops! An error occurred while requesting portability.
telephony_alias_portability_order_addres: The fields “house number/name”, “additional house number” “street type” and “street name” must not exceed 35 characters.
telephony_alias_portability_order_succes: Your portability request has been submitted.
Important! For the portability process to be launched, you need to validate your order by following the instructions in the link below.
telephony_order_specific_typology_error: An error occurred while retrieving the information.
telephony_order_specific_typology_conten: Automated content editing, delivered by an automated system
Content editing for services delivered by physical, qualified people
telephony_alias_portability_order_sda_sv: For any special number portability, you must fill out the identity validation form.
